author: chaase3
msg: DERBY-6459  Remove Class.forName calls that load JDBC driver from Derby samples/demos
Modified top-level demo.html file to reflect changes to VTI demos.

author: arkurth
msg: Fixed problem in VMware.pm::get_datastore_imagerevision_names. It wasn't searching recursively.

Updated Module.pm create_vmhost_os_object to override which OS module gets created if the VM host profile image is pointing to a UnixLab image. The UnixLab module won't work under most circumstances. Changed to use regular Linux.pm.
